name: Diesel - Fool's Errand - Simple Fool
additionalNotes: Diesel has released the Fool’s Errand Stubborn Fool as the initial release in a trilogy of well-constructed limited-edition cigars. In each box you’ll find a tarot card that depicts the Stubborn Fool, which can symbolize new beginnings or luck. The Fool’s Errand Stubborn Fool may appear to be fun and games, but this full-bodied joker ain’t nothing to laugh about. Produced at A.J.’s Nicaraguan factory, it offers excellent construction and comes only in the perfecto size which has nipple at the foot. On the inside, this first-annual limited release has a combination of Honduran and Nicaraguan fillers. Bound with Honduran leaf and then finished off in a dark oily Connecticut broadleaf wrapper, this premium handmade is ready to entertain your tastebuds.
